snippet: The mayor and deputy mayor of Spring Valley, N.Y., both charged last week as part of a far-ranging corruption case, refused to step down but also found public support.
abstract: Spring Valley Mayor Noramie F Jasmin and Deputy Mayor Joseph A Desmaret face calls for their resignation at first community meeting since they were arrested on bribery charges; both say they do not intend to step down.
lead_paragraph: The mayor and deputy mayor of Spring Valley, N.Y., both charged last week as part of a far-ranging corruption case, refused to step down but also found public support.

headline.seo: First Spring Valley, N.Y., Meeting Since Officials’ Arrests
headline.main: Arrests of 2 Officials Lead to a Tense Village Meeting
headline.print_headline: Arrests of 2 Officials Lead To a Tense Village Meeting
